comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Eduard Ritter von Schleich (August 9, 1888 – November 15, 1947), né Eduard-Maria Joseph Schleich was a high scoring Bavarian flying ace of World War I. He was credited with 35 aerial victories at the end of the war. During World War II, he served in the Luftwaffe as a general. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eduard_Ritter_von_Schleich
